author: rse
msg: Make shared object loading work again (now that -DHIDE is the default).
Distributed modules are loaded with AP_<name>_module and custom
modules are now loaded with the fallback strategy via <name>_module
(because their <name>_module is not and canno be hidden by hide.h).

author: marc
msg: Let's shout even louder at people about submitting bug reports.

author: dgaudet
msg: Protect against various FD_SETSIZE restrictions.  Note that I couldn't
really test this well -- because libc5 linux systems just don't let you
muck with FD_SETSIZE easily.  Folks on BSD systems should be able to
-DFD_SETSIZE=16 or 20 and produce lots of interesting failures.
Clean up make_sock error messages a bit.
